one-off.translation[0].definitions[0].de: happening or done only once, not as part of a regular series
one-off.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It’s yours for a one-off payment of only £200.
one-off.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something that is done or made only once
one-off.translation[1].definitions[1].de: someone who is completely different from anyone else
